DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate treatment AZD9668 28 day effective treating Bronchiectasis ( Brx ) compare placebo ( substance action ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II , Placebo-controlled Study Assess Efficacy 28 Day Oral AZD9668 Patients With Bronchiectasis
DOC.criteria: Female non child bearing potential Clinical diagnosis bronchiectasis Be sputum producer , history chronic expectoration day Concomitant diagnosis pulmonary disease bronchiectasis COPD FEV1 < 30 % predict normal
